data.name: PlannerPage_ValidationTopicsNotAllocated
data.value: The following topics have been allocated less than an hour each and so will not appear in your schedule. This problem occurs if the topic weights are too small relative to the number of hours in the plan.:{1}{1}{0}{1}You can try one of the following:{1}1.Increase their weights in the topics list or aggregate them with other topics.{1}2.Increase the total number of hours planned by adjusting the regular timetable or postponing the Review/Consolidate phase.

data.name: InviteEmail_Body
data.value:
Hey

I've got this study planner app that allows me to share my progress with friends.

It would be great if you could also download it and we can keep each other motivated!

www.plannerpig.com
Download for iPhone / iPad
Download for Android

data.name: UpgradePage_TitleOne
data.value: Oops, this feature is only available on the full version

data.name: UpgradePage_ParagraphOne
data.value: Fed up of cramming? Is studying just about passing the exams? Or is it more to you?

data.name: UpgradePage_ParagraphTwo
data.value: We believe studying is an expression of our power to decide who to be, what to do and how to live. Get more out of studying by taking control of it.

data.name: UpgradePage_ParagraphThree
data.value: “What a man can be, He must be.”{0}A. Maslow

data.name: UpgradePage_ParagraphFour
data.value: Planner Pig is a personal trainer for your studies. Just like you can do more push-ups when somebody’s watching, you can study with more discipline and consistency when you do it with Planner Pig.

data.name: UpgradePage_UnlockFeaturesOne
data.value: Full calendar view of your plan
